descriptionHtml:
Updated to v1 experimental.

Created with CBBEv2 model.  Compatibility with CHSBHC is confirmed.

Main File of Oil_e Skin removed
Optional file, Universal removed

Feedback is needed and appreciated.  This is experimental, I am aware that there are some flaws in this design.  I have noted and will fix in my future release.

Fixes/plans for future version 1.0:
-Triangle between shoulders.  This was intentional. 
-Lower half of the bum has no shine when crouching.
-Breasts will have a softer and smoother shine in multi-directional lighting
-Smoother seams
-Completed full body; head, hands and feet will have Oil_e shine
-Any oversights gathered from your feedback
author: sixt6
